title: FarmDirect
description: FarmDirect is a digital marketplace that connects farmers directly with consumers and retailers, eliminating middlemen and ensuring fair pricing for both producers and buyers.

title: Restaurant Finder
description: A web application that allows users to search for restaurants based on location and cuisine, and view detailed information such as menus, reviews, and ratings.

title: Coded-pad
description: In CodedPad, you can add a name for your code snippet. If a snippet with that name already exists, it will redirect you to view the code. If not, it opens a code editor where you can create and save your code.

title: Formify
description: Formify allows you to create, customize, and manage forms with ease. Add a title for your form, and if it already exists, you’ll be redirected to edit it. If not, it opens a form editor where you can design fields (e.g., text, signature, dropdown), collect responses, and export data as CSV or PDF.

title: AI Code Reviewer
description: An AI-driven code reviewer powered by Google Gemini. It provides instant feedback on code quality, performance, security, and best practices — perfect for learning, debugging, and improving code.
